Standard.Name: The Treasure of Hassan Ben Sahid 1.1.2.2.1.1.2

English.Text: Your men offer far too little, so the bathhouse thugs help themselves to it all anyway. Their ringleader, the old man who led your treasure-seeking officers here, turns out not to be blind at all. He gives your officers something rather less pleasant than a massage until they agree to write a note ordering supplies be released from the ship's hold. Once the exchange has been made, your shame-faced officers are finally allowed to go free.
